EventStory.Headline: Edited Transcript of ISBC.OQ M&A conference call or presentation 3-Dec-20 4:00pm GMT
EventStory.Body:
Investors Bancorp Inc. to Acquire 8 Berkshire Bank Branches - Conference Call
PITTSFIELD Dec 10, 2020 (Thomson StreetEvents) -- Edited Transcript of Investors Bancorp Inc M&A conference call or presentation Thursday, December 3, 2020 at 4:00:00pm GMT
TEXT version of Transcript
